subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Cory Schneider made 33 saves, and the playoff-hopeful Devils used a quick start to top Nashville. The Stars ended a six-game winless streak by beating the Islanders.
snippet: Cory Schneider made 33 saves, and the playoff-hopeful Devils used a quick start to top Nashville. The Stars ended a six-game winless streak by beating the Islanders.
